name: European Pilot Selection and Training
about: European Pilot Selection and Training (EPST) is a premier flight school based in the Netherlands, specializing in ab-initio pilot training. As an EASA-approved ATO (NL-ATO-37) and EASA-STD operator, EPST offers a comprehensive integrated training program designed to prepare students for a career as airline pilots. The training includes a Basic Training phase at OSM Aviation Academy in Norway or Sweden, followed by an Advanced Training program that includes airline-style jet training. EPST is renowned for its rigorous selection process and high-quality training, ensuring students meet the standards required by major airlines. After completion, EPST provides ongoing support, including free simulator training and interview preparation, to help graduates secure their first pilot job quickly. With a strong track record of placing students with international airlines, EPST is committed to delivering top-notch training and career support.
services:
["FINANCING THE TRAINING PROGRAM
AIRLINE JET FOUNDATION COURSE
AFTER COMPLETION OF THE TRAINING PROGRAM
TYPE RATING"]
